sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
What number should be added to each of the numbers \(7 \), \(13 \), \(21 \), and \(26 \) to make them proportional.
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "Lets suppose that the required number is $z $.

Since the numbers $7 + z $, $13 + z $, $21 + z $, $26 + z $ are in proportion, we have
\[
	\frac{\input[s1v1]{} + z }{13 + z } = \frac{\input[s1v2]{} + z }{26 + z }
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow (7 + z )(26 + z ) = (13 + z )(21 + z )
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 182 + z (\input[s2v1]{} ) + z ^2 = 273 + z (\input[s2v2]{} ) + z ^2
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow z (33 - 34 ) = 273 - 182 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{273 - 182 }{33 - 34 }
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 3, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{\input[s3v1]{} }{\input[s3v2]{} }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{\input[s3v3]{} }{1 }
\]
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [7, 21], "text": "$$\text{Four numbers are proportional when $a:b::c:d$, thus, using this result we get} \frac{7 + z }{13 + z } = \frac{21 + z }{26 + z }$$"}, {"data": [33, 34], "text": " Upon cross- multiplication and further simplification we get \[
	z = \frac{273 - 182 }{33 - 34 }
\]"}, {"data": [91, -1, -91], "text": "Further simplification will give us the result as \[z= \frac{-91 }{1 }\] "}]
